name: playwright-directories
description: Playwright directory structure and usage guidelines for claude-flow container

context.critical_instructions: ALWAYS use these directories for Playwright files. NEVER use 'npx playwright', use 'playwright' command directly!

environment.browsers_location: Browsers are pre-installed at /opt/playwright-browsers during Docker build
environment.no_install_needed: DO NOT run 'npx playwright install' - browsers are already installed

directory_structure.playwright-tests/: ALL Playwright test files MUST be saved here (*.spec.js, *.test.js, or any test scripts)
directory_structure.playwright-results/: ALL screenshots and test artifacts MUST be saved here
directory_structure.playwright-report/: HTML test reports are generated here

usage_examples.save_test_file: Always save test files as: playwright-tests/your-test.spec.js

context.important_note: NEVER create Playwright files in the root directory. ALWAYS use the designated directories: playwright-tests/, playwright-results/, playwright-report/
